tool_description: Cryptocurrency API that provides live exchange values on USD for top coins by market cap.
name: Global Cryptocurrency
title: Global Cryptocurrency

api_list.name: Get Coin with Name
api_list.description: Get specific coin rate, analytic values, market cap for given valid  name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com/coin/name/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com/coin/name/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com/coin/code/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
